segment.source: Add Multilingual Support to a Windows Distribution
segment.target: Add Multilingual Support to a Windows Distribution

segment.source: Add Multilingual Support to a Windows Distribution
segment.target: Add Multilingual Support to a Windows Distribution

segment.source: Add Multilingual Support to a Windows Distribution
segment.target: Add Multilingual Support to a Windows Distribution

segment.source: You can use Windows® Setup to deploy a multilingual edition of Windows.
segment.target: You can use Windows® Setup to deploy a multilingual edition of Windows.

segment.source: This is a typical scenario for corporations that deploy Windows in a multilingual environment where the users must be able to switch the display language between multiple languages on a single computer.
segment.target: This is a typical scenario for corporations that deploy Windows in a multilingual environment where the users must be able to switch the display language between multiple languages on a single computer.

segment.source: This procedure requires the following steps:
segment.target: This procedure requires the following steps:

segment.source: Copy one or more language packs to the Langpacks directory in the Windows distribution.
segment.target: Copy one or more language packs to the Langpacks directory in the Windows distribution.

segment.source: The Windows distribution is the contents of the Windows retail DVD.
segment.target: The Windows distribution is the contents of the Windows retail DVD.

segment.source: Update the Lang.ini file.
segment.target: Update the Lang.ini file.

segment.source: Use Setup to install the language packs that are in the distribution share.
segment.target: Use Setup to install the language packs that are in the distribution share.

segment.source: Important
segment.target: Important

segment.source: Adding language packs to the Langpacks directory can extend the Windows Setup installation time.
segment.target: Adding language packs to the Langpacks directory can extend the Windows Setup installation time.

segment.source: Packages in the Langpacks directory are added to the Windows image during the windowsPE configuration pass, before Windows is actually installed.
segment.target: Packages in the Langpacks directory are added to the Windows image during the windowsPE configuration pass, before Windows is actually installed.

segment.source: If Windows Setup must install several language packs, then installation might be delayed.
segment.target: If Windows Setup must install several language packs, then installation might be delayed.

segment.source: To add language packs to a Windows Distribution
segment.target: To add language packs to a Windows Distribution

segment.source: Copy the Windows distribution to a local directory.
segment.target: Copy the Windows distribution to a local directory.

segment.source: For example, copy the contents of the Windows product DVD to a directory named C:mydistribution.
segment.target: For example, copy the contents of the Windows product DVD to a directory named C:mydistribution.

segment.source: Locate the lp.cab files for the languages that you want to add to the Windows distribution and copy them to a local directory.
segment.target: Locate the lp.cab files for the languages that you want to add to the Windows distribution and copy them to a local directory.

segment.source: Create the Langpacks directory in the distribution share.
segment.target: Create the Langpacks directory in the distribution share.

segment.source: For example:
segment.target: For example:

segment.source: Copy the language packs to the Langpacks directory of the distribution share.
segment.target: Copy the language packs to the Langpacks directory of the distribution share.

segment.source: For example:
segment.target: For example:

segment.source: (Optional) To make additional languages available in Windows Setup, copy the localized Windows Setup sources to the distribution share.
segment.target: (Optional) To make additional languages available in Windows Setup, copy the localized Windows Setup sources to the distribution share.

segment.source: For example:
segment.target: For example:

segment.source: Where E: is the location of the Windows distribution that contains the localized Windows Setup resources.
segment.target: Where E: is the location of the Windows distribution that contains the localized Windows Setup resources.

segment.source: The /cherkyi parameters for the xcopy command copies all hidden files and subdirectories and overwrites all files in the target directory.
segment.target: The /cherkyi parameters for the xcopy command copies all hidden files and subdirectories and overwrites all files in the target directory.

segment.source: Mount the Windows image that is in the distribution share.
segment.target: Mount the Windows image that is in the distribution share.

segment.source: This step is required for the Deployment Image Servicing and Management tool (DISM.exe) to report the list of languages that are installed in the .wim file, and to recreate the Lang.ini file.
segment.target: This step is required for the Deployment Image Servicing and Management tool (DISM.exe) to report the list of languages that are installed in the .wim file, and to recreate the Lang.ini file.

segment.source: Use DISM to mount the Windows image.
segment.target: Use DISM to mount the Windows image.

segment.source: For example:
segment.target: For example:

segment.source: Report the languages that are available in the distribution share or installed to the Windows image by using the /Get-Intl option and specifying the distribution share.
segment.target: Report the languages that are available in the distribution share or installed to the Windows image by using the /Get-Intl option and specifying the distribution share.

segment.source: For example:
segment.target: For example:

segment.source: Verify that the correct languages are displayed as available languages and that The other available languages in the distribution display the correct languages.
segment.target: Verify that the correct languages are displayed as available languages and that The other available languages in the distribution display the correct languages.

segment.source: For example:
segment.target: For example:

segment.source: Recreate the Lang.ini file.
segment.target: Recreate the Lang.ini file.

segment.source: For example:
segment.target: For example:

segment.source: When you add or remove language packs from a Windows distribution, you must recreate the Lang.ini file.
segment.target: When you add or remove language packs from a Windows distribution, you must recreate the Lang.ini file.

segment.source: The Lang.ini file is located in the sources directory of the Windows distribution and is used during Windows Setup.
segment.target: The Lang.ini file is located in the sources directory of the Windows distribution and is used during Windows Setup.

segment.source: The lang.ini file in the sources directory should look similar to the following:
segment.target: The lang.ini file in the sources directory should look similar to the following:

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: You can choose a language for Windows Setup from those that are available in the distribution share when you run Setup from a full operating system only.
segment.target: You can choose a language for Windows Setup from those that are available in the distribution share when you run Setup from a full operating system only.

segment.source: If you run Windows Setup for bootable media or Windows PE, you must add optional components to the Boot.wim file for multilingual support.
segment.target: If you run Windows Setup for bootable media or Windows PE, you must add optional components to the Boot.wim file for multilingual support.

segment.source: For more information, see Add Multilingual Support to Windows Setup.
segment.target: For more information, see Add Multilingual Support to Windows Setup.

segment.source: Unmount the .wim file and commit the changes.
segment.target: Unmount the .wim file and commit the changes.

segment.source: For example:
segment.target: For example:

segment.source: You can now run Windows Setup.
segment.target: You can now run Windows Setup.

segment.source: During the installation, you will be prompted to choose one of the languages you added to the distribution share.
segment.target: During the installation, you will be prompted to choose one of the languages you added to the distribution share.
